phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Hey, have you seen her yet?
You dork, you have not seen the foreign girl yet?
Yeah, she is in 8th grade, Class A.
She just transferred here last week.
Her name's Asuka Langley Sohryu, did you know that?
Since she was raised over there but born here,
do you think she already has a boyfriend?
I bet she broke up in Germany, and she is here in a foreign land
with a heart that cannot be mended.
Did you hear all the cat talk?
At least the pictures do not reveal her personality.
This is the gorgeous Asuka greeting you!
You should appreciate your good fortune!
I am the most popular girl in school!
Hey, the other one's here too, is not she?
I am talking about the First Child, of course!
You must be Rei Ayanami, the pilot of the prototype.
I am the designated pilot of Eva Unit 02.
If I am ordered to, I will.
Are only weirdos chosen to be pilots?
You must be enduring an unrequited love.
A woman with a mole in the pathway of her tears
is destined to a life full of them.
If you are trying to put a move on me, I am afraid you cannot.
There is a very ugly face observing us.
You are a little less discreet than I expected.
He has not ever been discreet in his life!
You have handed over Unit 02, right?
I just received orders this morning that I will be staying here on loan.
So we can hang around again,
You have got to be kidding!
We just got this report from the battle cruiser Haruna.
Huge submerged object detected off Kii peninsula.
The data has been collated and examined.
All personnel, go to first stage alert.
The recent battle severely damaged the intercept system.
Only twenty-six percent of our defense capability is available.
And our operational capability for actual combat is virtually nil.
Therefore, we are going to have to intercept the target
at the water's edge, right before it makes landfall!
Units 01 and 02 will mount an attack in a series of waves.
In other words, close in and take turns.
My Japanese debut, and she will not let me solo.
Why do I have to bring you?!
Well, let me tell you something, just do not get in my way!
His selection as a pilot must have been a joke, right?
Two against one is not what I call a fair fight.
We do not get a choice.
Damn it, do not give me orders, you dumb rookie!
What did you think of that, Third Child?!
A fight should be clean, elegant and without waste.
Unit 01 was attacked by Target Alpha,
which separated from the target submerged 2 km off Suruga Bay.
At the same time, plus 20 seconds, Unit 02 was halted by Target Beta.
We have a comment from E-Project chairperson.
You totally screwed up my debut battle!
You are the one who charged in there acting like an idiot!
How dare you call me that?
Pathetic excuse for a combat pilot!
In your rush to show off, you completely ignored procedures!
In your rush to show off, you completely ignored procedures!
You look like a drowned rat!
At 11:03 AM, NERV abandoned the operation
You look like a drowned rat!
At 11:03 AM, NERV abandoned the operation
You cannot say that kind of thing to me!
You cannot say that kind of thing to me!
And yielded command to the UN Secondary Force.
At 11:05 AM, UN forces attacked with an N2 mine.
We will have to re-draw the map again.
They succeeded in burning off 28 of the target's structural substance.
They succeeded in burning off 28 of the target's structural substance.
A second attack is a matter of time.
A second attack is a matter of time.
At least we have time to regroup.
You cannot ask for more than that.
Do you know what your job is?
Your job is to defeat the Angels.
NERV does not exist to make grotesque displays like this.
Why does everyone get so angry here?
It is because adults are much too aware of their credibility.
The person in charge must take responsibility.
Here are the internal protests and damage reports.
This is a bill from the UN,
and here you have complaints from the PR department as well.
I can tell what they say without looking.
If you are going to fight, do not do it here, right?
I will do it as soon as we take care of this Angel.
I swear I will destroy that Angel.
The Vice Commander is pretty angry.
You will almost certainly be demoted if you embarrass him again.
It was good luck within bad luck that Commander Ikari was not here.
If he would been here, you would have been fired before he ever saw these.
So, have you brought me an idea to help save my job?
I thank you, Dr. Ritsuko Akagi.
It is good to have a friend one can count on.
However, I am not the one who will be saving my old friend.
Not that anyone's here, of course, but...
What in the blazes are you doing in my house?
You have been dumped for the new model!
Misato will be living with me.
That is a more logical choice when you consider my superior abilities.
Although honestly, I would rather live with Kaji.
Say, just why are Japanese houses so small anyway?
Not even half of my stuff fits!
And the Japanese sure do not have any sense of privacy.
How can they live in a room without locks?
It is because the Japanese way
is to consider the priorities and needs of others before one's own.
You two are going to get along real well, right?
This is all preparation for the next operation.
There is only one way to destroy the seventh Angel!
A simultaneous two-point attack on each target's core
In other words, an attack by two Evas with synchronized timing.
Cooperation and coordination between you will be paramount.
Therefore, I want the two of you to live together.
A boy and girl should never sleep together after the age of seven!
A boy and girl should never sleep together after the age of seven!
The Angel is currently restoring itself.
It will begin its second assault in six days, so there is no time.
Now, we have a way to make it possible!
The master attack pattern will be choreographed using this music.
In six days, as soon as possible.
He is been gone three days, right?
Hey, there is the class rep.
To offer condolences to Miss Sohryu.
You look like two peas in a pod.
We have to eat, breathe and sleep together!
No, it is not like that!
Then, just what is it like?
Why do not you explain all this to us?
You should have told us that first.
I could never sink to the pathetic level this animated turnip lives at!
If you ask me, this whole idea is impossible!
But you do not have anyone else, do you?
It looks like I should alter the operation to pair Shinji and Rei.
You have got to follow her!
I have to pilot the Eva. I have got no choice.
No matter what, I will put Rei and Misato to shame!
You do not have to squash them.
You are being too simplistic, even if you are a man!
It is a matter of honor now, you see?
She will be there all night.
So that means we are all alone tonight.
This is the impenetrable Wall of Jericho, Third Child.
Take one step over this wall and you will be a dead man.
And now, it is time for children to go to bed!
Why do the Japanese sleep on the floor?
You are just a child yourself.
There is nothing between us anymore.
But your lips did not say no.
I was young, and it is still the biggest blemish on my whole life.
I meant that he may still like you.
You are only proving my hypothesis.
Why do not you go with your feelings?
It is not like it is still eight years ago.
Well, I have got to get to work.
Target has broken through the final defense line at Gora.
We will not fail this time!
Spread your AT fields as soon as the music starts.
The target has entered the mountains.
Just remember Shinji, full power, maximum performance.
We will finish in sixty-two seconds.
What are you doing on my Unit 02?!
You are the one who fell on me!
You are the one who lost his timing first!
What were you doing, staying up so late last night?!
I know you tried to kiss me while I was sleeping!
You caused it by calling for your mother and sleepwalking!
Those kids are embarrassing us again.
In the crater of Mount Asama lies an unhatched Angel.
NERV personnel attempt the first capture of an Angel.
An Eva with special equipment challenges the fires of Hell!
